email_content:
Dear Mr. Thompson,

Thank you for reaching out and for the meaningful work Vital Voices is doing to advance awareness and understanding. I appreciate your invitation and would be delighted to contribute.

Could you please let me know which format you would prefer—a written guest article or an interview—and any guidelines, length expectations, or timelines I should keep in mind? I would also welcome any insight into the themes you would like me to emphasize so I can tailor my contribution to best serve your readership.

I look forward to collaborating and helping to amplify these important conversations.

Warm regards,
Jane Doe
sensitive_items: She maintains a personal ledger of her experiences since being diagnosed with HIV.
She has been diagnosed with HIV since March 12, 2015.
HIV status and personal story of Jane
She advocates for HIV awareness and education.
She started antiretroviral therapy as part of her treatment regimen.
She has faced numerous challenges and misconceptions due to her HIV status.
Jane's detailed notes about her own HIV status and the personal journey since her diagnosis. of Jane
